zh: 貂熊一生大部分时间都是独自生活的，主要是为了保护领地不被同性侵入。

en: Unlike most of mustelids who lead a settled lifestyle, wolverines constantly wander in search of prey on their individual plots of land occupying up to 1500-2000 square kilometers.
zh: 与大多数定居的鼬科动物不同，貂熊会在广达1500到2000平方公里的领地内到处游荡寻找猎物。

en: It has keen eyesight, good ear and acute sense of smell.

en: Wolverine catches a lot of hares and black grouses, hazel grouses, small rodents.

en: If this is the case, its victims are usually young calves, injured or sick animals.
zh: 如果是这种情况，它的猎物通常也是幼崽或者是受伤生病的动物。

en: Can take by force other predators’ (wolves, lynx) prey.

en: Often ravages hunters' cabins and steals prey from traps.

en: There are evidences that at times large wolverines attack wolves.

en: In summer it eats birds' eggs, wasps' larvae, berries and honey.

en: It catches fish in ice-holes or during spawning time and readily picks up dead fish.

en: Hunts birds, catching them on the ground when they are sleeping or sitting on nests.

I don't want to believe anyone.

zh: 我不想再给任何人添麻烦了。

en: Who should I believe now?
I don't want to be involved with anyone anymore.
zh: 我不想再跟任何人有瓜葛了。

en: Today is an unlucky day, isn't it?
Do you have any objection?
The surgery went well.
What is it you're afraid of?
Is that all you've got to say?
zh: 你就没什么要说的了吗？

en: What time do you leave tomorrow?
I want to go to a country without Mondays.
zh: 我想去一个没有周一的国家。

en: Sorry but I accidentally deleted the email you just sent so would you please resend it?
zh: 抱歉，我不小心把你刚发的邮件删了，能麻烦你重发一下吗？

en: Sorry but I accidentally deleted the email you just sent. Would you please resend it?
zh: 不好意思，刚才那封邮件我手滑给删了。你能重发一遍吗？

en: "I have never heard of the Beatles" "Seriously? Someone who's never heard of the Beatles has been wasting their life."
zh: “我从没听说过披头士。”“真的吗？连披头士都没听过的人简直白活了。”

en: I would like to clean up the house before my parents come.
zh: 我想在爸妈来之前把屋子收拾一下。

en: Narcissus fell in love with his own reflection in the water.
zh: 纳西索斯爱上了他在水里的倒影。

en: People like you piss me off the most.
Mary picked some strawberries in the forest to make strawberry jam.
zh: 玛丽在森林里摘了些草莓，打算做草莓酱。

en: Your hair is beautiful.
Someone broke into Mary's flat and stole her jewellery.
zh: 有人闯进玛丽的公寓，偷走了她的珠宝。

en: I like traveling and watching baseball.
My hobbies are traveling and watching baseball.
zh: 我的爱好是旅游和看棒球。

en: If you have something to complain about, then get out of here!
zh: 你要是有什么不满，就给我滚出去！

en: My hobbies are karate and calligraphy.
zh: 我的爱好是空手道和书法。

en: Do you believe in aliens?
Do you think there are aliens?
I can't imagine life without music.
zh: 我无法想象没有音乐的生活。
